name: Striders of Destiny
flavorText: “Like many of his fellow students, Delsere was fascinated by Li-Ming. His master work was an homage to her, and he swore one day she would wear it.” -High Councilor Valthek
flavorTextHtml: “Like many of his fellow students, Delsere was fascinated by Li-Ming. His master work was an homage to her, and he swore one day she would wear it.” -High Councilor Valthek
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Casting Arcane Orb, Energy Twister, Explosive Blast, Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, or Wave of Force reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by 3 seconds.(4) Set:     
 You take 60% reduced damage while you have a Slow Time active. Allies inside your Slow Time gain half benefit.(6) Set:     
 Enemies affected by your Slow Time and for 5 seconds after exiting take 12,500% increased damage from your Arcane Orb, Energy Twister, Explosive Blast, Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, and Wave of Force abilities.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Casting Arcane Orb, Energy Twister, Explosive Blast, Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, or Wave of Force reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by 3 seconds.
(4) Set:
You take 60% reduced damage while you have a Slow Time active. Allies inside your Slow Time gain half benefit.
(6) Set:
Enemies affected by your Slow Time and for 5 seconds after exiting take 12,500% increased damage from your Arcane Orb, Energy Twister, Explosive Blast, Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, and Wave of Force abilities.
